pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṁ yathādhammaṁ nihatādhikaraṇaṁ punakammāya ukkoṭenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.3: “akataṁ kammaṁ dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kammaṁ anihataṁ dunnihataṁ puna nihanitabban”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.4: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.5: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṁ yathādhammaṁ nihatādhikaraṇaṁ punakammāya ukkoṭessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.6: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jānaṁ yathādhammaṁ nihatādhikaraṇaṁ punakammāya ukkoṭethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.9: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, jānaṁ yathādhammaṁ nihatādhikaraṇaṁ punakammāya ukkoṭessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.11: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:1.12.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṁ yathādhammaṁ nihatādhikaraṇaṁ punakammāya ukkoṭeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:2.1.6: sāmaṁ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassa ārocenti, so vā āroceti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:2.1.8: dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena kataṁ, etaṁ yathādhammaṁ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:2.1.10: cattāri adhikaraṇāni— vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ, āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:2.1.12: “akataṁ kammaṁ dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ punakātabbaṁ kammaṁ anihataṁ dunnihataṁ puna nihanitabban”ti ukkoṭeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc63:2.3.2: “adhammena vā vaggena vā na kammārahassa vā kammaṁ katan”ti jānanto ukkoṭeti,
